title: Neural Data Science
description: Project-based course in which students will use computational notebooks to perform exploratory data analyses and to test hypotheses in large neuroscience data sets, including the differences between unique neuron types, leveraging text mining of the neuroscience literature, and human neuroimaging analyses. Enrollment restricted to MS students only in the following major code: BI84, BI87. May be coscheduled with BIPN 162.
